QuestData.Title: Halting the Empire's Fall
QuestData.Description:
Nazmir be havin' problem after problem, $n. I not be knowin' how it can get much worse dan an Old God tryin' ta take over.
I be makin' me way back ta Zul'jan ta lead our efforts ta keep Nazmir safe.
Ya should return ta Zuldazar and let Baine know what be goin' on here. Maybe he be likin' dis here underrot, who knows?
I can get ya outta here and back ta Zul'jan, if ya be needin' it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Baine Bloodhoof within Zuldazar.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Baine Bloodhoof within Zuldazar
